body.name: ATUMTEK Phone Tripod Mount, Universal Smartphone Mount Adapter with 2 Cold Shoe and 1/4" Standard Screw, 360° Rotates and 180° Tilts Adjustable Cell Phone Clamp Holder for Perfect Mobile Photography

features: [2 Standard Cold Shoe] The mobile phone tripod mount is equipped with two cold shoe mounts, allowing you to attach microphones, photography lights, and other accessories. Additionally, the cold shoe mounts can be easily rotated to adjust the angle of your equipment.

[1/4" Screw Thread Design] The upgraded tripod phone mount features a standard 1/4" screw hole, making it compatible with tripods, selfie sticks, monopods, cameras, stabilizers, video sliders, ring lights, handle grips, and other accessories.

[360° Rotation and 180° Tilt] Effortlessly switch between landscape and portrait mode or any angle in between. Unlike traditional cell phone tripod mounts, ATUMTEK phone tripod adapter has an adjustable angle design, allowing you to adjust the pitch angle on a tripod or camera hot shoe without needing a ball head. It's more convenient and easy to use.

[Fits Phones of Any Size] This iPhone tripod mount securely holds your phone on any tripod, even with a thick case. Compatible with iPhone 14 Plus, 14 Pro Max, 14, 13 Pro Max, 12, Galaxy S23 Ultra, S23 Plus, S23, Note 21, Pixel 7 Pro, 6 & more (any smartphone within 2.16 inch to 3.7 inch wide). The thick non-slip silicone pad protects your phone while providing a stable grip.

[Compact and Durable] The phone holder for tripod is made from high-quality ABS plastic, ensuring it is rugged, durable, and functional. Weighing only 54g, it's convenient for use and storage. The perfect tripod phone holder for capturing photos, videos, vlogging, FaceTime chats, live streaming, and more.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The phone attachment for the tripod features two cold shoes, allowing you to attach accessories like lights or microphones to enhance your setup. This is particularly beneficial for vloggers or anyone looking to elevate their phone photography. Additionally, the mount is equipped with a 1/4 screw thread, enabling attachment to a wide range of tripods and other camera accessories. The cell phone tripod mount boasts a 360-degree rotation feature, facilitating easy switching between portrait and landscape mode without the need to remove your phone. This is especially advantageous for video shooting, enabling you to capture footage in both orientations seamlessly. Another notable feature of this iPhone mount is its 180-degree tilt capability. This allows you to angle your phone up or down based on the shot you're aiming for. Whether it's a group selfie or a close-up of a flower, the tilt feature simplifies the process of achieving the perfect shot. Despite its numerous features, the iPhone holder for the tripod is surprisingly compact and lightweight. Its mini size ensures easy portability, allowing you to carry it wherever you go so that you never miss a photo opportunity. Despite its small size, the mount is remarkably durable, providing a secure and safe hold for your phone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great replacement! Works perfectly!
reviews.reviewText: My ring light had an attachable phone stand that originally came with it, and the phone mount ended up breaking. I decided to look on Amazon and IMy ring light had an attachable phone stand that originally came with it, and the original phone mount I had ended up breaking over time. I decided to look on Amazon, and I found this to be compatible with my ring light. I was very pleased with the cost and how stable/sturdy it feels. My only critique is that it doesn’t have full 360 free motion. It stops at every 90° angle, but that doesn’t affect much for me. My phone does not sit perfectly straight, but I can bend my ring, light to accommodate, so I can’t complain. I just wanted to make that note.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I use it for creating content and my phone fit perfectly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This item fit my tripod well and was easy to adjust. I would recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very well made
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to use with a selfie stick. Very well made with lots of adjustability. Highly Recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Phone holder swivel
reviews.reviewText: It holds phone firm and swivel to desired angle

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: For the price I feel this product is great. I was shopping on a budget and this is probably one of the better ones out there in its price range. My current led light is too heavy for this so I had to rig something else to hold that. Overall I like this for the limited times I need it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars exactly what I needed
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a tripod mount for my Samsung Galaxy Note 10+ and this unit fits it perfectly. Goes right onto my tripod and holds the phone perfectly. Easily turns to your needs and holds steady. I can't ask for more than that.
The spring action makes it quick and easy to attach or remove my phone. Holds it steady on my tripod at every angle I've tried so far. Wish I'd bought one of these years ago.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Well made, good for holding phone.

reviews.reviewTitle: Stabile Ausführung und sehr gute Optik
reviews.reviewText: Ich war auf der Suche nach einer Halterung für mein großes iPhone und dieser Anbieter entspricht am Besten meinen Anforderungen.
Costa meno di analoghi prodotti di marca ma ha più funzioni! È ergonomico ed ha soluzioni brillanti per sistemare il cellulare in qualsiasi posizione. Anche sulla macchina fotografica!

reviews.reviewTitle: La calidad de construcción es buena
reviews.reviewText: El producto tiene un buen look anda feel. La calidad es buena. Todo plástico. La pinza d que retiene el móvil es fuerte. Bien diseñada evita que el móvil se caiga incluso estando boca abajo. Muy usable. Con slots para añadir flash o luz led fija. Se puede acoplar en variedad de trípodes y palos selfie.
